author: cnbc.com
title: LRAD: Fiscal 2Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ LRAD Corp. (LRAD) on Tuesday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $461,000.
The San Diego-based company said it had net income of 1 cent per share.
The developer of directed sound technologies used by the military and police posted revenue of $7.9 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, the company's shares hit $2.30. A year ago, they were trading at $1.85.
